attributes.action: stop the extradition of Gary Mckinnon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this country should not be a patsy for the USA and we should defend and protect out citizens not let them be extradited abroad. This man suffers from aspergers and deserves our help and support not turning our backs on him as this government wants to do. Gordon Brown you have a child with a disability think how you would feel.

rejection.details: The Home Secretary does not have general discretion in this case. He can only stop extradition if he finds that McKinnon’s human rights would be breached.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
